title: Microsoft | L62 | India
content:

Years of Experience: 3+

Title/Level: L62
Location: Bangalore

Signing Bonus: 7 (4 + 3)
Relocation Bonus : NA
Stock bonus: 130k USD for 4 years
Bonus: (0-20%) of base pay
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): First Year - 42(Base) + 4(JB) + 27(Stocks) = 73 + 0~8.4(Bonus) = 73~81.5
Benefits: Standard microsoft benefits
Other details:
Prev Comp - 50-55 LPA
